title: Hilary Duff confirms her Lizzie McGuire co-stars will reunite for her Disney sequel series
text:
They were a staple of the Disney channel throughout the early 2000s.

Now Hilary Duff and her original Lizzie McGuire co-stars will be reprising their roles for a continuation of the teen sitcom on Disney's new streaming service.

The 32–year–old Younger star shared a photo to Instagram Thursday of the cast together again for their first read-through on the revived series.

The gang's back: Hilary Duff, 32, revealed her original Lizzie McGuire family will return to star in the upcoming Disney+ sequel series via an Instagram photo of their pilot episode read-through; pictured (L-R) Hallie Todd, Jake Thomas, Hilary and Robert Carradine

Disney first announced that new Lizzie McGuire series at its D23 Expo in August, but Hilary's photo is the first confirmation that her TV family would be returning for the show.

Jake Thomas will reprise his role as Lizzie's brother Matt, who constantly feuded with his sister and devised a series of comical schemes.

Robert Carradine, a member of the Carradine acting dynasty, will portray her loving yet bungling father.

Hallie Todd has only appeared on screen sporadically since appearing on the original Lizzie McGuire, but she'll also return as the eponymous character's mother.

Sibling rivalry: Jake Thomas will reprise his role as Lizzie's brother Matt, who constantly feuded with his sister and devised a series of comical schemes; still from Lizzie McGuire

Back at it: Robert (M) and Hallie (R) played loving parents who didn't have a clue how to raise a teenage daughter on the original Disney show; still from the Lizzie McGuire Movie

This week, the foursome got into the swing of things with a read-through of the new show's inaugural episode.

The gathering marks the first time the actors have all been together in more than 15 years.

In addition to the original cast, the new series will boast the original Lizzie McGuire creator Terri Minsky, who most recently created the Disney series Andi Mack.

'We are incredibly excited to bring back one of the most popular Disney Channel series of all time along with some beloved and familiar faces,' announced Disney+ Content & Marketing President Ricky Strauss in a statement.

'With Terri at the helm and Hilary, Hallie, Robert, and Jake back after all these years, it’s our honor to welcome the McGuire family into the Disney+ family.'

The gathering marked the first time the cast have been together in more than 15 years. The new show also features the return of original creator Terri Minsky; pictured October 12

Love birds: Hilary with her fiancé Matthew Koma on October 12. The couple got engaged in May 2019 and share an 11–month–old daughter Banks

The new Lizzie McGuire show will star follow the title character as she's on the verge of turning 30.

She works as a prestigious decorator's assistant in New York City, but still imagines something bigger in life for herself.

In addition to the actor's portraying her family, viewers can expect her animated doppelgänger to return as well.

Despite the 15-year difference, Duff will still play the cartoon character as a 13–year–old.

'Just like there is no Lizzie McGuire without Hilary Duff, there is no McGuire family without Hallie, Robert, and Jake,' wrote Disney Channels Worldwide President and CCO Gary Marsh in a statement.

'The original series holds a special place in the hearts of so many, and we can’t wait to introduce fans, both old and new, to an older, wiser, yet still perfectly imperfect Lizzie.'

Longevity: Hilary has played a main role on TV Land's Younger since 2015. With its seventh season airing in 2020, it became the longest running original series for TV Land; pictured on set May 22

Since the end of Lizzie McGuire in 2004, Hilary has kept busy with a steady string of film and TV appearances.

She appeared this spring in the reality-inspired horror film The Haunting Of Sharon Tate, and has played one of the series leads on TV Land's Younger since 2015.

The comedy, which stars Sutton Foster in the main role as a divorcée who lies about her age to get a prime job in the publishing industry, finished airing its sixth season in early September.

A seventh season is expected to air in 2020, making Younger the longest running original series on TV Land.
description: Hilary Duff revealed the actors playing her family on Disney's original Lizzie McGuire series will return to the sequel series. She shared a photo of the cast during their first read-through on the pilot.
